description: This file provides an API client for campaign messaging operations, including creating campaigns, fetching campaign details, and retrieving campaign reports. It abstracts HTTP requests to a backend service for campaign management functions.

methods.name: createCampaign(payload)
methods.description: Creates a new messaging campaign using provided payload data, sends a POST request to the '/campaigns' endpoint, and returns the response data.

methods.name: getCampaign(campaignId)
methods.description: Fetches details of a specific campaign by its ID using a GET request and returns the response data.

methods.name: getCampaignReport(campaignId)
methods.description: Retrieves the final delivery report of a campaign by its ID via a GET request and returns the response data.
